scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:build && docker tag firehose:latest 641120096525.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/firehose:latest && docker push 641120096525.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/firehose:latest
scripts.docker:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 641120096525.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
